name: EKCalendarItem
desc: An abstract superclass for calendar events and reminders.

items.name: var calendarItemIdentifier: String
items.desc: The calendar item’s unique identifier.

items.name: var calendarItemExternalIdentifier: String!
items.desc: The calendar item’s external identifier as provided by the calendar server.

items.name: var calendar: EKCalendar!
items.desc: The calendar for the calendar item.

items.name: var title: String!
items.desc: The title for the calendar item.

items.name: var location: String?
items.desc: The location associated with the calendar item.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date that this calendar item was created.

items.name: var lastModifiedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date that the calendar item was last modified.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone for the calendar item.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL for the calendar item.

items.name: var hasNotes: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has notes.

items.name: var notes: String?
items.desc: The notes associated with the calendar item.

items.name: var hasAttendees: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has attendees.

items.name: var attendees: [EKParticipant]?
items.desc: The attendees associated with the calendar item, as an array of EKParticipant objects.

items.name: var hasAlarms: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has alarms.

items.name: func addAlarm(EKAlarm)
items.desc: Adds an alarm to the receiver.

items.name: func removeAlarm(EKAlarm)
items.desc: Removes an alarm from the calendar item.

items.name: var alarms: [EKAlarm]?
items.desc: The alarms associated with the calendar item, as an array of EKAlarm objects.

items.name: var hasRecurrenceRules: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has recurrence rules.

items.name: func addRecurrenceRule(EKRecurrenceRule)
items.desc: Adds a recurrence rule to the recurrence rule array.

items.name: func removeRecurrenceRule(EKRecurrenceRule)
items.desc: Removes a recurrence rule from the recurrence rule array.

items.name: var recurrenceRules: [EKRecurrenceRule]?
items.desc: The recurrence rules for the calendar item.
